review_content: Got a bottle first time in Dublin 2011. Pretty decent lager. Crispy and bit malty. Positive surprise.
Old Untappd checkin, January 23, 2016. Green glass bottle. Clear appearance. Heavy skunky aroma and flavor.
Taste is corn, light caramel, faint floral hop. Nose is corn and chemical. Soft palate. Tastes better than it smells
Horrible artificial taste, very sweet. This beer is as good as their govt. Makes you feel bad for the chineze proletarians.
Looks very picturesque (for a short time). Clear golden color and a white head. Simple grainy Lager.

Eine goldene Farbe. Die Schaumkrone löst sich sehr schnell auf. Interessanter malziger Geruch. Spritzig am Anfang. Das verflacht mit der Zeit und wird zu einem sehr süffig malziger Abgang. Hopfen ist nicht wahrnehmbar.

Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień w celu uzupełnienia profilu na RateBeer. Degustacja odbyła się jakiś czas temu.
Instagram/czgr_
Very light malt and hops, very low bitterness, very refreshing, mild, thirst-quenching, with a hint of malt grain sweetness.
Old rating from 2010 - 330ml bottle, pours clear amber with a small white head. Aromas & tastes of grain, flora, corn & malt. Light body. Light finish.
Not the worst Asian lager. Some artificial taste, remind me on Chinese cheep stores all over te world.

I had this at Shoguns. Pours gold with a white head. Taste light, sweet, weak. I thought this was ok. I could drink this again.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
640 ml - 4,7%vol. Per accompagnare una cena cinese va bene! Leggera, leggermente aromatica. Chiara lager beverina.
Rating copied from Untappd. Had at an AIK practise at Shenzhen Universiade Center in Shenzhen in 2014.

0.64 l bottle (ABV 4,7%) from K-Citymarket Ruoholahti. Golden, clear, small head. Not as sweet as I was afraid of - the ending has almost some hoppiness. Anyway, this is quite good with spicy oriental food.

Bottle from local Yamaya store. Skunky nose (could be Saaz hops.... but I doubt it) but not too much, along with something like honey. Medium pale gold color, thin stream of carbonation rising. Thin fruity flavor, some decent hop bitterness in mid palate, and a touch of cardboard. Definitely has more going for it than most Asian export lagers.
Light. Creamy. Smooth. Very mild sweetness. Low bitterness. Refreshing on a hot night!

Dorada, con muy poca retencióny es un poco dulce.
Tiene un aftertaste un tanto extraño, no es unpleasan pero si medio agridulce.

Pale gold, with a dense white head on pouring that quickly diminishes. Aroma, grains, grass, straw, faint malt. Crisp, clean taste, with floral notes, and a following hint of lemon. A touch watery. Standard mass market lager, but does the job well.

Bottle. Gold with very fizzy head, no retention. A malt and grain aroma. Taste is moderately sweet malts and grain but a bit watery. There is light bitterness in the finish. Light body but carbonation is decent. No off-puting flavours, refreshing, but a very ordinary lager.

From a 330ml bottle on 1/6/2020 (abv listed as 4.5%). Pours and ultra clear golden with a small head that disappears immediately. Virtually no aroma, juts a hint of grass and grain. Tastes of sweet malt and grain, followed by a gentle bitterness. Light bodied with average carbonation. It is what it is.
Not a bad Asian lager. A little bit hoppy, taste is bitter. Nice to have on occasion. Not my number 1 choice but it was worth trying. I’m not begging for my money back lol.
Clear golden color with minimal white head. Malty, hay aromas. Little bitterness. Light body.

330mml. bottle. @"home", 07/05/2020
[#3.378 Global - #5 China - #1 TsingTao Brewery (My Chinese Brewery #3)]
Clear Golden color with a small White head. Aroma is sweet grains, rice and metallic grassy. Taste is sweet and fizzy.
Next one please!
Light, not very bitter,  minimal aroma but on a hot summer's day an icy tsingtao goes alright. better than most Chinese lagers
Has a very metallic taste that somehow seems familiar with many Asian lagers.  Nothing special but taste good with Chinese food.

Bottle - Clear golden colour, small white head, poor retention. Grainy aromas with some yeasty note. Taste is weak malty with some corny and metallic aftetrtaste. Thin body, high carbonation, watery texture, dry and empty finish. Featureless.

12 ounce bottle poured into a brandy snifter. The beer is a clear gold with a fizzy head of white foam. Skunky and earthy grass aroma. Sweet perfumy taste. Kind of dry finish. Lighter body and medium carbonation.

Złoty klar. Piana mocarna. Drobne oczka. Ubita jak śmietana. Extra lacing. 
Przeskunks i gotowane warzywa w aromacie. Landrynki? 
Wodnistość, pustka, bezsmak. Goryczka? IBU minus 15. 
Idź pan w … 
Drugi raz nie wypiję. Nawet za Chiny Ludowe.
Straw golden yellow very thin head disappear lots of carbonation disappears quickly smell of grains grassy taste of malts grains grassy goes down easy nothing special
Available in every chinese restaurant in London. Light, bright and bubbly. Crisp and clean taste, can have a slight metallic finish, but generally OK.

Color amarillo pálido transparente con espuma media blanca de poca retención y sin residuo. Aroma ligero a cereal blanco y minerales. Sabor también ligero a cereal y lúpulos nobles con notas a minerales y ligero limón. Amargor ligero con regusto corto. Textura acuosa, cuerpo ligero y carbonatación media. Una Pale Lager aguada, más cercana a un agua mineral con sabor que a una cerveza. Nada remarcable.

Никогда не поставлю низкую оценку хорошему китайскому светлому пастеризованному пиву. Тем более это Tsingtao достаточно популярно и дороже любого другого в Китае. Очень хорошо утоляет жажду. Можно пить и пить. Не меняет вкуса к концу третьей бутылки. Spaten светлый тут рядом не валялся. Рекомендую!

Appearance: golden, clear, lots of carbonation, no foam.
Aroma: malt, corn, grains, citrus, hint of rice.
Flavor: a bit sweet, malt, hard to define something.
Aftertaste: sweet, weak.
Overall Impression: water with some flavour of malt, lots of carbonation and very watery. Far away from a real Lager.

Golden straw color with a thin film of foam.
Nose. Malt, hint of hops.
Taste. The body is light, carbonation is soft. The taste is malt, sweetish. The aftertaste is a hint of hops, and even a slight bitterness.
Tragedia. Woda o smaku geranium i marihuany. Estry na kosmicznym poziomie. Praktycznie niepijalne. Zero goryczki.
Dało się wypić, bez żadnej przyjemności, ale nic więcej. 青岛啤酒 spróbowałem i nie planuję tego powtarzać

Tap in Shenzhen at Four Seasons. Had to try it for the tick not the taste. Skunky   aroma of yeast and grain. Flavor was neither pleasing nor refreshing but about what I would expect as a typical mass produced beer.
# 946 et # 947; 2/2018 (bottle and can). Lehčí, docela osvěžující mezinárodní ležák. Výrazný citrusový tóny.
Okropieństwo. Skunks, woda, brak jakichkolwiek wrażeń, może odrobina kwiatów i zboża, to tyle.

Mało orientalne, chociaż nie było się czego spodziewać. Który to już raz piwo z drugiego końca świata kopiuje nasze europejskie gatunki. Pachnie chmielem a w smaku same słody. Nie można się tak naprawdę przyczepić. Jednorazowa przygoda.
To jest dramat kuywa. Slomkowe, nigdy nie widzjalem tak jasnegi piwa. Zapach nawet nie tragiczny, taki slodowy. Smakuje jak woda gazowana, tylko po wodzie sie tak nie odbija.
Uzupełnienie ocen piwnych bez opisu z uwagi na przeniesienie z papierowych zapisków.
500ml bottle from Tesco, Watford and drunk on 28/05/2006.  Not sure who was brewing this in the UK at the time.  A fairly bland pale lager, not totally undrinkable, but honestly; why bother?

Terrible beer. No body, no flavor and just plain awful. Smells bad looks bad and the after taste was scummy. I would not recommend this beer to anybody or would I ever drink it again. About the only thing it's worth is the cool green bottle and logo.
Not really tasty or aromatic, but it's good to drink for refreshment. It's easy to drink and goes down well in the stomach.

This beer has an unpleasant taste of lake water, and a bit of cannabis mixed in. After a gulp I felt my head be struck with a hammer.

The smell is more unpleasant than the the taste. It smells as if it is drenched in sweat, and has been smoking pot at the same time. 

The only positive is the logo on the bottle looks ok.

This beer taste awful, and smells awful. Both of these are similarities in a majority of beers that come in green bottles.
Very nice refreshing taste. Served cold is a great clean taste. Great value beer but often hard to find.$20 per dozen.
Goes down very easy, great with spicy food and refreshing on a hot, humid day
Piany brak, barwa słomkowa. W aromacie kanalizacja. W smaku brak goryczki, czuć metaliczny posmak
Chmielu nie czuć w ogóle, w smaku dość słodkie, moim zdaniem aż za bardzo. Zapachu praktycznie brak.
Simple lager, sweetish and with minimal bitterness from grassy hops. Drinkable.
Pale and clear. Not much head retention. Clean and smooth taste. Low bitterness. A little too sweet. If it is cold and you are thirsty, it's nor a bad industrial lager.

Very nice light lager. Mild in taste, amazing mouth feel and is extremely smooth. Would take this over many comparable beers any day. Not amazing but damn better than a lot of what’s out there 5.75/10

Such a smooth, Sharp, Clean, Crisp beer. It's china's answer to Heineken. 

I really do rate this beer 100%

Bottle. Clear light golden liquid with medium white head. Aroma of skunk, metal, weed, grain and dms. Taste is light sweet and medium bitter with notes of grain, metal and light corn. Medium bodied with medium carbonation. Decent but skunky as hell.
Dünnes Lager, typischer Pilsgeruch, schwach auf der Zunge, leicht süß im Abgang.
When I drink this beer I was in Germany and it has a decent taste. So I will give a fair rate. May have a light DMS aroma from Pils malt. light amber in color. moderately medium carbonation.
Brilliant taste and aroma, not so good when warm, though who’s going to have a warm beer when you can always have it cold

An excellent beer to accompany spicy food, or bbq, or Asian cuisines. An easy drinking beer best served ice cold. Minimal aftertaste, pleasant and non-confrontational. Barely a hint of malt, and a bit on the sweet side (but not cloying). A personal favorite.
Clear gold with a small white head. Close to an Amstel with a little less bitterness. Slightly sweet.

Tastless - Boring - Nasty ! Please don´t waste your money one this one. I was offered this a couple of weeks ago, I drank water instead.
Tsingtao = recycled chinese piss
It is one of the lightest beer i ve ever drink. It has really neutral taste and aromas with great shinning yellow colour. Like it.

Bottles at Imperial Inn in Chinatown during the mid 2000s. Pale golden with large fast retracting head. Notes are skunked lager, corn, Chinese toxicity, and malt. Thin and forgettable but it prob killed some of the nastiness of Chinese food.

This beer used to be slightly sweeter with a more substantive malt backbone. Having tasted this brew over the decades I can definitely say the recipe has changed somewhat. It is lighter, less flavorful, possibly less alcohol but still pleasant and refreshing. Nothing wrong nothing great. Solidly average.

De botella en Tuk Tuk. Aroma a lager simplona, algo de maltas y algo de lúpulo. En boca es carbonatada e insípida, como una mahou muy floja. Retrogusto suave que empuja a beberla como si se acabara el mundo. Puf.

This tastes like something you find at a college party. Like cheap American Coors light. Almost zero flavor. Saved for the end. Very smooth like water because that's mostly what you're probably drinking. Smells like a Heineken. Don't waste your money.

Drucken på Golden China, Uppsala. En helt ok öl till chinamaten, men inte så mycket mer än så. Rätt svag faktiskt. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This beer is tots awesome sauce!

I put that**** on everything!

Tastes like asisa but ive never been there so... pretty damn good tho, way better then no name beer... if youre not a beer dork this beer good;)
Floral aroma in a light yellow gold pour.  That is the best feature and the rest is probably better than drinking the water.  So there’s that to recommend it I guess.
600ml Flasche. Klar und golden mit minimaler Schaumkrone. Getreidig. Leichter Körper. Milder Geschmack.

I had this several times, mainly paired with Asian cuisine. Now that there is usually more of a craft selection, I'll go with that.   Not sure if better than Kirin, but similar in style.  Maybe a little more crisp, if that means anything.  As far as pale lagers go, could be about average or better than.  Not a style I prefer though.  It is what it is with this beer, just don't expect much.

Bottle from amazing oriental in Utrecht, The Netherlands. 
The beer is clear golden colored with a small, unstable white head. Carbonation is good. 
The aroma is malty and light hoppy, with notes of grass, grains, sweet malts, citrus, bread and some spiciness. 
The taste is light bodied and light sweet with malts and grains and goes to light bitter and very watery. Lacks body completely. 
The finish is light dry, bitter and very watery.
Aus der Buddel. Der Geruch ist frisch und grasig. Der Antrunk ist sehr süß und wässrig. Beigeschmack von Briefmarken. Leicht malzig. Alkohol schmeckt man raus
Bottle at Mimosa buffet, Aldershot. Standard lager, more bitter than some.  Could go into more details but really this isn't deserving. Could be worse though.
Pours clear yellow with a frothy white head. Aroma of harsh malt and corn syrup. Taste is slightly malty with a harsh nose note. Almost no palate.

Bottiglia da 0,5 cl presso un ristorante cinese. Molto chiara e limpida, schiuma quasi inesistente. Aroma leggero di luppolo e una leggerissima nota di limone. In bocca risulta molto leggera e acquosa, nonostante ciò emergono delle note interessanti di limone e malto. Tutto sommato una birra da poche pretese, bevibile e dissetante.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Perfectly ordinary middle of the road beer. Pour, color and taste are ordinary.
Lager da poche pretese. Chiara trasparente e dorata. Classico sentore metallico al palato. Beverina e dissetante
CHINA. Cerveza normal, quizá un poco afrutada, pero nada especial. Ahorrarse el exotismo chino si hay otra.

https://www.ecowatch.com/monks-mound-climate-change-2630294376.html
Attention !!!!

0.33 bottle @ Zdrowa Konkurencja
Clear, gold with a small, white head. Aroma of pale malts. Taste is sweet, malty, floral. Light, slick, average. Overall, a bit floral but otherwise very insipid.
It smells like a lager is meant to smell like if ou are in a working class British pub. But it’s Chinese. It would be good with spicy food. Nothing memorable.

Kolor słomkowy, idealnie klarowne, puszysta biała piana. Po otwarciu uniósł się sfond squnksa. Poza tym lekko słodowy i drożdżowy aromat. W smaku lekka metaliczność i mokra szmatka. Ogólnie piwo mega rozwodnione.
Bottle. Pours clear golden with minimal head. A: Super light, some rice maybe T: thin to thin/medium body, generaly not much Flavor but I expected much less So a good surprise

Bottle 33 cl. Straw-golden color with snow-white foam,. Aroma: a bit floral, a little herbal, light malt, grain. Taste: light malt, a bit of candy and sweets, watery, rice balls and the slightest hint of bitterness on finish. Lager for spicy food.
Piwo jasne klarowne o żółtej barwie, piana biała drobnopecherzykowa pozostawia lacing. W aromacie dms, w smaku warzywa. Zwykły eurolager
Yellow color and quickly disappearing white head. Has a sweet & sour, bit malty kinda divisive aroma. Rather bready than malty, some plastic-like flavor with a thin and watery mouthfeel.
Es una cerveza con buen sabor y aroma. Es bien ligera y con muy poca espuma.
Tastes like a Mexican drank actual decent beer then pissed it out. You can smack 50 of these and not feel a thing, just a headache. Horrible horrible horrible beer

Light skunky nose on the premium lager from Tsingtao. Head disappears almost upon the pour. Nothing to get excited about and appreciate the green bottle because it least it had a skunky flavor. I like it as a complement to good seafood! I’m ok with this and the colder the better.
Biere désaltérant elle a le goût d'eau un peu de céréale, un peu sucrée rien de fou

Bière jaune paille brillant avec un col et carbonation moyenne, bue au Mandarin,  Il s'agit d'une  chaine de restos chinois. Le nez est pétillant laissant la route au houblon. Goût herbé sans plus. Bof, c'est une bière froide qui désaltère avec de la bonne nourrirure chinoise.

Eines muss man dem Bier lassen: Auch wenn es ein Industriebier erster Klasse ist, so hat es zumindest einen anderen Geschmack als die klassischen europäischen Industriebiere.
Es ist recht leicht und hat einen süßlichen Touch, der vermutlich vom Reis kommt.
Klassisches "ein-Mal-probiert"-Bier.

International anerkendt som den fineste øl i Kina Tsingtao er en utrolig glat og let at drikke pilsner . deres mesterbryggerier vælger kun den fineste malt og humle og blander ris fra de vestlige kvarters uafskallede marker til at bløde bitter efter smag, hvilket gør det til en af ​​de mest 'drikkelige' øl omkring.

A very good tasting beer I think! 
There is a lot of shite on the market - this one is higher than most. Way above Heineken or staropramen with only nastro azzuro being perhaps equal in taste, this is only my opinion obviously
Классика азиатского пива для жары и острых блюд:). Не оригинально, но и не противно.

Pours pale yellow with a thin white head.

Aroma is corn, straw, veg and plastic. Taste is sweet with a watery light bitter finish. 

OK at best with a spicy Chinese but that’s it. Bland, boring lager.

Zapach: chmiel, kwaskowy, kukurydza, deliaktnie biszkopt
Kolor: jasnozłoty
Smak; chmiel, kwaskowy, kukurydza, delikatnie biszkopt
Wysycenie: średnie

Słaby lager. W zapachu i smaku to samo: chmiel, kwaskowość, kukurydza i delikatnie biszkopt. Nie ma odrzucających aromatów, ale także jest dość wodniste i po prostu nijakie. Słaby, niczym nie wyróżniający się koncernowy lager

I’m not a beer expert by any means but I do know a beer that isn’t worth buying again. This is such a beer. I’ve had luck with other inexpensive Chinese beer (yanjing namely) but this beer was extremely disappointing. I am
A fan of lagers and lighter tasting beer but I found myself searching for any semblance of hops, or malt, ANYTHING when drinking this. It was almost akin to drinking water, very little carbonation and no matter how cold it was it still felt dead on the tongue. I won’t be buying again.

Color amarillo, transparente. Espuma blanca escasísima. Aroma casi imperceptible, flores, limón. Sabor a  limón, ácido y un toque amargo, muy ligero. Textura acuosa. Carbonatación media para conseguir que, por lo menos, refresque.

Cerveza con una pequeña cabeza que se evapora en pocos segundos. Tiene un cuerpo ligero, es de baja carbonatación y de un color amarillo pálido. En su aroma se percibe la malta y un poco de lúpulo. En boca es malteada, ligera. Una de muchas.
0,33l bottle. Pours clear straw with small white head. Aroma of skunked hops, slight malt. Taste is very slight malt, slight bitterness. Basically water. And why the green bottle?
大家好！这是我在Ratebeer上写的第一条评论。刚进入Craft beer的世界不久，向各位多学习。在青岛啤酒下的评论，我觉得用中文。——Kaiping,Jiangmen,Guangdong
0,33 l bottle. Looks like common market lager without special taste and smell

L:
-pours a very light straw golden with a small to medium,foamy,white head
-light to medium carbonation visible
S:
-lemon,grassy,spicy,light skunk,perfume
T:
-Follows the nose
F:
-medium carbonation
-light body
-slight alcohol noticeable
O:
Very much a light Lager like it's become tradition in Asia.
The stuff you chase your asian food down with or you drink cool or ice cold on a ridiculously hot day while vacationing in Asia.
I can't say it's terrible though (aside from bottling it in green bottles,making it susceptible to skunking), just really boring.
Cerveza con poco aroma y sabor. Parece que te estás bebiendo un zumo en vez de una cerveza.
Geen smaak, noch nasmaak. Zielloos. In de hitte is het wel verfrissend om te drinken.

ABV = 4.5%. BB 08022019. From a bottle poured a crystal clear pale gold with a few mm of bright white foam that diminished quickly and did not lace. Carbonation low, slow and coarse. Aroma slightly of sweet malt; no obvious hops. Taste slightly of sweet malt; no bitterness. Light body. Smooth, crisp and refreshing if cold with a short, slightly malty finish. Slightly more malty than the domestic Chinese version.

A single tall can from Oceanside Liquor store in West Vancouver. A yellow beer with white head and not much nose. A bit hoppier than the average pale lager, with a bit of malt in the background. Not much going on here. 2.1

Enjoyed: Poured from a bottle into cylinder/flute glass. 
Appearance: Pale golden colour, with medium head. 
Aroma: Malt, hint of hops, rice?...
Palate: Light body, gentle carbonation.
Taste: Malt, grain, rice?, hint of hops
Overall impression: Easy and drinkable but nothing special.
Meh. Not offensive, just another nothing-y bottled lager. You know what you're getting and if what you need is just something super cold to get some beer in you it'd do the job I guess.

I loved Sopporo, when I saw this I had to pick it up. Not good.






Dddddddd
Better than many pale lagers, theres a bit of flavour in there, but no bitterness to lift it, just a watery beer with a cereal flavour. Drinkable, especially with Asian food flavours.

Tsingtao poured into glass from Green Bottle. Imported by Asia Market Luxembourg. Not skunked. Light taste, crisp, refreshing, watery. Good with hot and spicy food. Not the best but will buy again. In my opinion the better but lighter version than Budweiser.

Robe paille limpide, mousse faible, carbo correcte, grosses bulles. Nez herbacé, léger. En bouche, c'est un peu aqueux, avec un léger goût de grain cru, mais surtout un côté herbacé. Ni mauvais, ni délicieux. Désaltère bien et se boit tranquille.
Clear fizzy golden color without head. Light grain aroma, quite refreshing. Ideal for hot days.
Pils maar dam niet veel aan. Verder kan ik er niets over kwijt...... drink op een zonnige dag wel goed weg.

German version, Clear golden beer with very short white head, smell is light sour, typical Pils but very soft and light, taste is watery with a light flavour, light cereal and very light bitter, short finish, soft carbonation, good drinkability but isn’t for to enjoy,
(I have 0.33l bottle with best-before 05.01.2019 and batch 19:52)

Classic context beer. It’s at the opposite end of the spectrum from a Belgian quad, but it has its place. A Belgian quad is a formula 1 car; it’s great most of the time, but it’s useless in a boat race. A Tsingtao to a dumpling feast is a jet boat to a boat race.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Fles thuis geprobeerd met Roelzie. Het is een helder geel bier met weinig schuim. De geur is stoffig en moutig. De smaak is waterig en moutig.

Aroma; pale malt, cooked vegetables, burnt rice.
Look; clear ultra pale golden, head lost.
Taste; pale malt, caramel, vegetables, sweet substance, cardboard finish.
Feel; thin.
Overall; fortunately I still had some diet coke.
[btl@Home]
Bottle at a Taiwanese Resteraunt in Madrid. Nose is sweet grains, hints of malts. Palate is sweet grains, very watery with a hint of beer. Very meh.

33cl can. It should be a quite good beer, but it has massive expensive price in Europe. Light colour, light Co2, and light foam describe this beer. Quite harmonic pale lager with sweetish taste, light hop and light hop. You can feel maybe some fruity taste (apple?), and some must or fug sidetaste. Surprisingly good to drink.
640ml bottle. Very light pale yellow color, almost no head. Bad malt aroma, some weird notes too. Taste is sweetish, bland, metallic notes. Terrible beer.

Botella de 330 ml servida en tarro. Color amarillo pálido, con una inestable corona de espuma blanca de burbujas abiertas que se difuminan rápidamente. Su aroma es suave a granos, maíz, arroz y lúpulos herbales Su sabor es muy sutil y modesto, aunque refrescante, a pan blanco y lúpulos herbales. Su cuerpo es ligero y con una carbonstación decente.

0,33 bottle from Lidl. 
The foam disappeared immediately when filled. Bright uncharacteristic color. It smelled really bad to me, with a sewer smell that didn’t match the beer. I had to see if it had deteriorated. It also had a wrapped sour puddle taste on the palate, next to it it was nothing like beer, it was more of just sour carbonated lötty. It doesn't deserve more words, Hungarian corn beers are more drinkable than that.
***
A hab kitöltéskor azonnal eltűnt. Világos jellegtelen szín. Nekem nagyon rossz volt az illata, valami sörhöz nem illő csatornaszaggal. Meg kellett néznem, hogy romlott-e. Ízre is volt egy burkolt savanykás pocsolyaíz, mellette semmi sörre hasonló, inkább csak savanyú szénsavas lötty volt. Nem érdemel több szót, a magyar kukoricás sörök is ihatóbbak ennél.
Ocena na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji na potrzeby uzupełnienia profilu.

From bottle which I kept refrigerated, drank on a cloudy but very humid day. In all honesty this doesn't really vary from any other pale lager, nothing special but there are worse ones available. Nicely refreshing if drank cold on a warm day.

Aroma: sweet, cereal, malt
Appearance: pale, yellow,clear, minimal head, white foam 
Taste: lightly bitter, cereal, rice sweet
Palate :light body, thin feel, soft carbonation,

Little to no foam. Quickly vanishes. Light yellow colour. Aroma of yeast and floral. Strong hops flavour with touches of wood and malte. Thin body and little carbonation. Dries your mouth at the end with bitter flavour.

clear yellow color with very small head. weak retention. weak aroma of sweet grain, herbal hops and low dms. moderately grainy sweet, low hoppiness. little crispy. low bodied, med-high carbonation. easy to drink.
Se trouve en restaurant chinois, un peu comme l'asahi, pas mauvaise, se descend vite.
Fles 32cl thuis. 4,7%. Vlak. Ruikt wat verschraald (lauw bier in gras). (7-2011).

Pours pale golden with almost no head. Grains, toast. Light bitter, light to medium sweet. Light body, decent carbonation, abrupt finish. Not that bad, pretty refreshing actually, but almost no aroma and very little to fawn about for the beer enthusiast.
I don't like this beer and so disappointing. We're not able to drink much in our Bangkok vacation last year. Taste like cigars.

Una cerveza fresca aunque no se le puede exigir demasiado, buen aroma, cuerpo ligero fácil de beber, retrogusto suave aunque poca carbonatación.bread, golden, clear, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour, light body, thin feel, soft carbonation,
flasa z Tesca. Slaba nevyrazna vona. zltkasta farba. chut jemne horka trochu sladkasta..

12 ounce bottle into lager glass, best before 5/26/2018. Pours crystal clear medium golden yellow color with a 1 finger dense white head with great retention, that reduces to a thin cap that lingers. Nice spotty soapy lacing clings on the glass, with a fair amount of streaming carbonation. Aromas of cracker, white bread dough, lightly toasted biscuit, and light herbal/grassy earthiness. Touch of fruit/skunk in the aromas, but not overwhelming. Nice and pleasant aromas with pale malt and mild earthy hop notes; with solid strength. Taste of cracker, white bread dough, lightly toasted biscuit, light pepper, and herbal/grassy earthiness. Mild herbal, grassy, spicy bitterness on the finish. Lingering notes of cracker, white bread dough, lightly toasted biscuit, light pepper, and herbal/grassy earthiness for a good bit. Nice robustness of pale malt and light earthy hop flavors; with a nice malt/bitterness balance, and zero cloying/astringent flavors after the finish. Fairly crisp/clean finishing. Perfectly clean on lager flavors, with zero yeast notes present. Lightly increasing dryness from lingering bitterness. Medium carbonation and light-medium body; with a very smooth, moderately bready/grainy, and lightly sticky balanced mouthfeel that is great. Zero warming alcohol as expected of 4.8%. Overall this is a nice pale lager. All around nice robustness of pale malt and light earthy hop flavors; very smooth, crisp, clean, and refreshing to drink. Very flavorful and never watery for the ABV. Nothing but clean pils malts and decent earthy hop presence/balance for the style. Not much skunk for the green bottles at all. A nicely enjoyable and well made offering.

Pours a very clear, very pale golden color. Very light white bubbly white head. Poor retention, no lacing.

Aroma is sort of a blend of Euro and Mexican lager.  Somewhat skunky.  Spicy hops.

Taste is watery.  Lots of spicy hops.  Not a lot of malt.  One dimensional, kinda bland.

Mouthfeel is light and very watery.  Dry and sharp crispness.

Overall it’s actually pretty good.  Bland, but the hops are exciting, but not overwhelming.  Enjoyable, I’d buy it again.
It's ok.  It have a little bit of bitterness taste, not strong. Tasted like a water down light beer. I actually spotted this beer at a asian market in Cleveland. The location didn't pop up.

I poured it from the bottle into a glass. It pours a pale golden with a white head. The aroma is slightly skunky with some grain. The taste is cereal and corn. It's your pretty much average foreign pale lager.
Internationa lager - what else to say? Smells and tastes like all the others.

This review of the 4.7% 330ml can from Lidl in Bulgaria. Pours clear with a brief thin frothy white head, medium lacing, some bead. Mid straw in colour but no green hints. Softly fizzy in the mouth with fine carbonation, little in the way of flavour at first, but quite a bit of sweetness balanced by gentle bitterness with hints of floral citrus. golden, cloudy, minimal head, white foam, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour, light body, fizzy, abrupt finish,

A couple of bottles in the Canton restaurant in Soho. I have drunk this many times before, but this is the first since rating commenced. I was pretty blasted at this point, but I know that it perfectly complemented the superb food. It's s macro lager with malt, some hops and a gentle rice flavour that I think adds to the mouthfeel. So, not the greatest start beerwise to the new year; the only new rate in a 4-pack of world lagers that my generous and thoughtful (but beer-unaware) boss gave me for Christmas. It pours clear yellow with a swiftly-vanishing white head and an aggressive fizz. Sweetcorn very much to the fore in the aroma and taste. There's a hint of honey malt and maybe a vague wisp of grassy hop but the sweetcorn really does overwhelm it. Too sweet and too corny; an unpleasant brew. Still grateful for the unexpected gift though.

Letting it sit and warm up did not take away from the experience other than temperature. Overall, its very average but sometimes average is good. I enjoyed it. Its something casual to drink on a hot day, or while eating hot and spicy food which is what I'm testing right now and liking it. Really good with fish by the way. German made Chinese beer.

Bottle and pint glass. Pours with a decent head, although it subsides quickly. Not a lot of carbonation here. The colour is clear and pleasant, light gold in tone. Aroma is very strong, almost offensively so, though it sort of adds to Tsingtao’s charm (?). Specifically speaking, it’s quite earthy and yeasty on the nose. The taste is refreshing and light, but definitely on the bitter side of the line. A slightly salty burn at the end. Quite a viscous palate, with not much in the way of fizz. Would highly recommend Tsingtao if you’re looking for a cheap, refreshing Asian lager. A must have when travelling in mainland China or HK. After all, when in Rome...

Wyg: Jasno slomkowe, piany prawie brak, symobliczny ultra drobnoziarnisty ring. Totalnie ultra klarowne. Tylko ten brak piany...
Sm: Srednio-wysoko wysycone, bardzo dominuje slodowosc, ale inna niz w typowych lagerach, troche jak woda po gotowaniu ryzu, dosc slodkie, gladkie, bardzo pijalne, grzeczne, subtelne i jednorodne, zdecydowanie zbyt wodniste i puste. Smaczne, ale nuuuuuuda. Na pewno lepsze od typowych, przesiarczonych lagerow.
Pos: Niemalze brak, soczysta slodowosc i moze ryz.

Slightly sweetish, a bit grainy taste of straw, grains and light cardboard, followed by a short, minimally bitter, slightly grassy finish. Thin to medium body, slightly effervescent mouthfeel, soft carbonation. Drinkable and bland.

Its a very skunky euro lager taste but there’s something different that I can’t quite put my finger on. It’s watery and light, but it’s really not as bad as people say. Probably not something id be interested in again, but worth the try. , I like Heineken a bit better
Aroma of malt. yellow color, minimal head. watery flavor, very light. nothing special.

Niewiele można powiedzieć o tym piwie. Podobno nazwa, to skrót - This Shit Is No Good Take Another One... Coś w tym jest. Kolor słomkowy, niemal przejrzyste, niewielką, białą pianą. Aromat głównie słodowy. W smaku trochę słodu, mocno wodniste. Jest w sumie na tyle bez smaku, że ciężko tu o jakieś poważne wady. Niemniej jednak piwo kiepskie!
Light and malty. This is a refreshing drink. However, this is not remarkable. Also, I hate green bottles.

Typical thirst quencher, but nothing more than that. Pours clear, pale yellow color. Typical lager smell. Thin body with lively carbonation. Kind of watery. Some bitterness and a bit of yeast, malts and grass. Metallic aftertaste.

330ml bottle 4.5% version in Canada Chinese restaurant. Pour light piss, no foam. Smell like a Pilsner and skunk, no it’s not my first one and I’m not unlucky to hit a bad one. I’m used to Chinese restaurants and it’s always the same. Bad liquid, I need to eat more rice and fried stuff to remove that !!! But it makes my in laws happy...

Wygląd niczym nie przyciąga uwagi. Kolor jasnożółty, piana szybko całkowicie opada. W aromacie to samo, co w większości tradycyjnych, komercyjnych lagerów - nic szczególnego, lekko wyczuwalne owoce. W smaku bardzo wodniste, męczące już po połowie butelki (330 ml). Ciężko wspomnieć cokolwiek o goryczce. Trudno wskazać jakiekolwiek pozytywy.
Ocena archiwalna, uzupełnienie ocen dla piw pitych jeszcze przed założeniem konta. Wybitnie wodniste, neutralne, delikatne, chociaż jednocześnie nie totalne dno.
330ml bottle. Pours clear golden with small white head. Quite basic lager with malt and slight floral hop taste. Dry which is a plus for me.
Just like water, except worse. I’d rather drink water than to drink this crap.

5. 11. 2016, Ljubljana, Cesarsko mesto. Bottled, plain and simple not much taste or aroma, watery. Good choice along a nice meal of Chinese food.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bue à Pékin à l’aéroport. Bière dorée, un peu trop aqueuse, pas trop mal cependant pour le style. 

2) Citronnée mais trop aqueuse !
Aus der Flasche in der Long March Kanteen in Berlin-Kreuzberg. Golden, klar, etwas Schaum. Sehr leicht, leicht bitter, etwas Zitrone.

Meh...not worth writing. But!
Pale yellow, wuickly disappearing head, faint aroma of rice and corn. Balanced in taste, dry, subtle taste, very thin.
Light straw color; Medium slightly creamy body; Aroma of malt, & hops; Flavor of slight sweet malt, some hops, and grain; Not too bad.

A can, regrettably, from the basement of Shing Kong Mitsukoshi, opposite Taipei main station, drunk at home. Aroma: barely identifiable, but not unpleasant. Appearance: the same as Jin Pai, nothing surprising here. Palate: well-carbonated, the slightest suggestion of bitterness betrays the brewery’s German origins. Taste: more bitter than Jin Pai, but overall disappointing, skunky. I positively disliked this. I have happy memories of quaffing Qing Dao from the big old green bottles with the pleasantly retro label, which I don’t see around town any more. What happened?
0,33 l Flasche. Hellgelbes, fast farbloses Bier, flacher weißer Schaum. Kaum Aroma, kaum Geschmack.

Aromat: z butelki mokry karton na pierwszym planie, do tego dziwna słodowość i delikatny skun po przelaniu dochodzą śladowe nuty warzywne (marchew, pietruszka) i lekki alkohol
Wygląd: barwa słomkowa, klarowne, piana biała, grubopęcherzykowa, błyskawicznie opada, nie zostawiając po sobie niczego
Smak: lekka słodycz, czysto słodowy i pusty, wodnisty, wady o dziwo gdzieś poznikały (pod koniec robi się lekko kartonowe), minimalna goryczka
Podniebienie: nagazowanie wysokie w kierunku średniego, puste, pijalność taka sobie
06-09-16 // can from local Asian supermarket. Clear golden, quickly disappearing white head. Medium sweet. Malty, watery. Hints of hops.
Wodnisty nijaki lager, z paskudnym aromatem i smakiem gotowanej kukurydzy (sweet corn). Wada powoduje że piwo jest słabo pijalne i męczące.

Clear yellow with quickly vanishing white head. Aroma is noble hops, some corn, and sweet grains. Taste is a really very fresh sourness, less harsh hop bitterness. Fresh sparkling mouthfeel, easily drinkable, however some awkward sweet grains in the finish. Well it is not great and I only bought it for ticking off China, but I really enjoyed the fresh character.

Uzupełnienie profilu

Słaby aromat, skunks, trochę słodu. Jakby lekki ryż (?), dalej wodniście, bez wyrazu ani goryczki

33cl bottle at home. Appearance: pale golden with medium, fast decreasing white head that forms a rim on the surface of the glass. Aroma: just malts and something soapy. Taste: fairly sweet and low bitterness. sweet malts, little grassy and a trace of apple. Palate: light bodied, thin texture and soft carbonation. In both taste and mouthfeel quite weak, but nice on a hot day.
Una cerveza suave con buen paladar. Nada fuera de lo común pero es buena cerveza.

640ml bottle
Grainy grassy aroma.
Light straw color with slight head.
Mild bitterness with thin finish.
Inoffensive lager but nothing else.

330ml. Bottle. Standard Lager. Tiny and fast diminishing white head. Color is clear yellow. Aroma and taste is weak. Aromas of grass, and taste a little bitter. 

Watery lager.
Bottle. A standard pale lager. Sweet malts, some corn, to little hops and to watery. This one is ok for a pale lager.

Vaalean kullankeltainen olut, joka näyttää jättävän runsaan vaahtokerroksen. Vaahto kuitenkin häviää melkein samantien jättäen vain pienen vaahtoreunuksen lasiin. Tuoksu mieto, maku myös varsin mitäänsanomaton. Ei tämä oikein maistu miltään. Varmaan voisi toimia mausteisen ruuan kanssa, mutta näin pelkätään ei oikein jaksa innostaa edes saunan jälkeen.
Clear pale gold color with no head. No aroma. First taste are some strange sweetness like corn with a small beer notes. To watery and it doesn’t have aftertaste. Poor in taste and poor in appearance.
Had this at an all you can eat Chinese buffet. Very light, slightly floral with a corn syrup and toasted rice taste. Pretty good, but nothing special.
Clear golden beer. Very light beer, taste is malty and a bit bitter. Aroma is grassy. Nothing special, watery lager.

33cl bottle at home. pours a clear glden colour with a small white head. aroma of grass, malt. taste is medium sweet and medium bitter. notes of light citrus, grain, corn. texture is watery, light bodied with medium carbonation.

Butelka 330 ml. Rozwodniony lager. Jakoś dałem radę, ale przyjemność niewielka. Uwaga na mokrą tekturę - zielona butelka podróżująca z daleka! Dodatek ryżu sprawia, że jest jakby płytsze i klarowniejsze.

Pours a straw/piss color from a bottle, not as much corn as I thought there would be in this beer, it was actually very refreshing. Had it right before a Sapporo, which was much fruitier by comparison. But I would drink this over an American macro. Okay beer.
Het standaard Chinese pils. Smaakt eigenlijk erg waterig, maar in deze hitte is het toch heerlijk.

ABV: 4,7. Importeur: Asia Express Food NL, German Version. 0,33 l Flasche aus einem lokalen chinesischen Restaurant. Riecht nach Weizen, Heu, leicht hopfig. Im Geschmack erst leicht süßlich, dann hopfig-würzig. Im Abgang ein leicht metallischer Geschmack

Pours a pleasant darker hay tan color. Had a slight chill haze, nothing bad. Very thin head. Has a surprisingly bolder body than what I would have thought. I always had a notion of a weaker watery brew.....no so. I detected a slight grainy overall taste with faint citrus overtones. Not a bad selection.
Dåse. Marginalt dårligere end Harbin. Faktisk skal man nok bare holde sig fra kinesiske makrolager. Ok makrolager generelt. Men damn det er svært at score godt øl i den koreanske provins.
Bottle at home. Pours clear golden, nose is light lemon, dull toffee, taste is similar, sweet.

Aroma: grass Appearance : clear yellow a littlw white head taste :very mild bitterness heavy malty a little sweetness of grain
flavor is too weak palate:light bodied 
from china
Pale straw - smells weakly of bread and hay. Taste is sweet, very mild bitterness - flavor is too weak, but at least not unpleasant.

From a bottle at Epcot. Pours clear pale gold with a fizzy white head. Tastes like pale malts, corn, grass, faint citrus, and some dough. Light body and low carbonation. Smells like pale malts, faint citrus, corn, grass, and dough.

33 cl bottle served in small lager glass. Pours golden with a bit of white head. Aroma of malt with weak hoppy notes. Taste sweet from starch adjuncts, but nothing much else; essentially watery malt soup. Heineken of the East?

Il est certainement de bon ton de négliger complètement cette production. Comme pour les autres produits, je suppose que la Chine arrivera dans un avenir proche à produire de bonnes choses. En attendant cette bouteille achetée dans un restaurant chinois n’a rien d’autre à offrir qu’une vulgaire pils genre Heineken. Je ne suis pas sûr de tester la bonne bière : je me suis seulement basé sur le taux d’alcool et la ressemblance de l’image de la bouteille !
Flesje gekregen. Bleek helder bier. Weinig aroma. Weinig smaak. Geen nasmaak.
Bottle, poured clear yellow, small white head, dissipating. Aroma was skunky, some light grain. Tastes was unspecial, light and watery.
Bottle at home. Pours golden colour and the head quickly dissipates. Aroma is sweet malts. Taste is very malt heavy, sweet with a little grain. Not much carbonation.
Aromat bardzo mocno skunksowy, pod tym jaki? s?ód. Do tego jaka? owocowo-winna nuta. Klarowne, niez?a piana. W smaku perfumy, warzywa, bardzo niesmaczne.
Nie ma co się rozpisywać. W aromacie jakaś mokra szmata z "perfumowaną" dozą. Piwo barwy złotawej, piana ucieka szybko. W smaku woda, ryż i ponownie perfumy. Szkoda życia.

Poured to a very light pale straw/yellow colour. Strong sweet and fresh smells. Palate is lightish, but still packs a good mouth feel. Little bitterness, but loads of full flavour that goes straight down the throat. Very refreshing beer that is difficult to put down.
Pale straw color, minimal head. Light malt aroma. Light sweet and bitter, in which sweetness is a little stronger in the finish. Not very light body, soft carbonation.
Bottle from local shop. Golden normal lager. Aroma and taste both are hoppy. One of my favorite lagers but not so good beer for enjoying.
Relatively good as for typical international lager, skinky aroma will be the only flaw, drinkable.
Bière très clair et translucide. Pas vraiment d?arômes au nez. Pas trop de goût, mais très rafraîchissante.
Bottle. Pale gold with a white head Skunky aroma. Light body and flavor. Very light carbonation.

Botella.del @Vips, Madrid 21/05/2016 BBD: 04/11/16
Color amarillo, cuerpo ligero, mala.

I drank this beer at some opportunities in China. It is a lager, nothing extraordinary, yellow and clear body, average carbonation, thin foam that it is disappearing quickly. The taste is really watery, few malt, no hop. It is a beer for hot abd wet days in China.
Bottled. At Mon Jin Lau, Michigan. Pours very clear, white head. Aroma is light citrus, water. Flavor is corn, wet cardboard, rice. Not great. Not too offensive.
Under average lager. No cap. Very clear and transparent. Taste and palette lol mites but with some bitter nuances.
Bouteille 33 cl - couleur jaune pale, rafraîchissant goût assez fade avec des notes sucrés, moyen

Je sais pas pourquoi je m’emmerde encore à noter des trucs pareil.
Évidemment c’est dégueulasse, évidemment il y a un goût de flotte, évidemment ça se pisse mieux que ça se boit...

Clear peal golden color with minimal head. Aroma of grass, rice, and lemon, surprisingly ok. Taste has mild malty sweetness - otherwise quite bland. Light body with prickling mouthfeel. Rich carbonation and light finish.

33cl (BL sampler 1). Bref: dusty, sweet cream of corn diluted with a metallic bitter hop-grassy and grainhusk bite. Should pair well with greasy, sweet, somewhat spicy Chinese fast food that demands regular quenching.

Pours clear, pale yellow color with very small white head. Typical lager smell. 

Thin body with lively carbonation. Texture is watery. Taste is slightly bitter with typical lager aroma. A bit of yeast, malts and kinda grassy. Feels slightly different then local lager beers, I’m guessing it’s due to the added rice. Slightly metallic aftertaste. 

Overall, plain and mediocre. Good thirst quencher, but nothing more then that.
Bottle from sake hana. Pours clear gold with some head. Aggressive notes of hop, malt, lemongrass, spices and bouquet. Really enjoyable with spicy sushi. I thought it was pretty tasty.
Pours clear yellow, slim head. Aroma is hay, lightly grassy. Taste is bland, slight corn or diacetyl notes. Mouthfeel is light.

Bottle at weather spoons. Very clear pale yellow coloured pour eitha lasting thin white head. Aroma is harsh green Apple and plastic, skunky hop. Flavour is composed of semi sweet place grains, cereal, rice adjunct, skunky hop, rice and cereal grains. A little stewed veg. Meh. China ticks.
Most Popolar Chinese Beer, Pale Clear, gold color with minimum head, almost no aroma, taste corn, not to strong. Asian Premium Lager

330 ml bottle. Clear pale gold color with no head. No aroma. First taste are some strange sweetness like corn with a small beer notes. To watery and it doesn’t have aftertaste. Poor in taste and poor in appearance.

Bouteille verte. Nez léger de grains de malt et sucré de maïs avec un semblant houblonné. Mince en bouche et légèrement aqueuse. Goût légèrement croustillant de malt lors de l’entrée en bouche suivi d’un léger goût malté sucré rappelant le miel et d’un léger goût sulfureux (métallique) puis une très légère amertume de houblon se rajoute au tout. Arrière-goût court très légèrement amer de houblon. [notes 2005]

Very light beer, a bit watery but still fresh. Some notes of honeysuckle and a short finish.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Słomkowe, klarowne piwo o średniej pianie, która dość szybko redukuje się do zera. Aromat słodowy, mało intensywny. W smaku mało przyjemne, sztuczne, apteczne. Goryczka nawet jest, ale bardzo nieprzyjemna, chemiczna. Ogólnie piwo smakuje bardzo sztucznie, jakoś tak chemicznie, zdecydowanie nie warte fatygi.

Nice overall, but it finishes with something like tap water. I guess its comes from minerals...
The aroma is good with bitter hope smell, tastes with a lot of bread-like.
Barwa jasnej słomki, puste, przeszkadza alkoholowa goryczka (pomimo stosunkowo niewielkiej mocy). Chemiczny smak i aromat. Słabe.
Yes, this is piss water. Thin, watery and utterly indeferent. Steer clear at all costs.
Bastante mala la verdad, no dice nada y es agua con cierto deje a cerveza, se puede beber pero como el que se bebe un refresco.
Fľaša 330 ml z Lidl Nitra. Zlatožltá farba, jemná biela pena, príjemná aróma. Stredne nasýtené, jemná horkosť, sladkasté ovocné tóny. Príjemné a osviežujúce pivo.
Yellow, small head. Skunky aroma with hints of fruits. Low but noticeable bitterness, moderate sweetness. Very light and refreshing.

Pours clear light golden with very small top that disappears quickly. Very light, malty aroma, some hay and dust as well. Taste slightly bitter, some sugar and corn notes. Dusty. Reminds a lot Russian classic Zhiguli, only bit sweeter and more dusty. Only with food with strong taste.

Really pale and clear golden color with medium white head. Sweet aroma, corny, malty, cerealy and slight artificial hops. Taste follows the aroma, moderate sweetness on the palate, with malts, cereals and cupboard.
0,33l bottle. Typical lager. Nothing special, dull, slightly metallic and sour. No hops, little malts.

Barwa złota, klarowne, skąpa biała piana, dość szybko znika. W aromacie słodowość, tak poza tym to nic się w kwestii zapachu nie dzieje. W smaku trochę słodkawe, ale przeraźliwie puste, słodowe, ale w nieprzyjemny sposób, jakby mokre siano. Goryczka niska, nawet bardzo niska, wysycenie wysokie, szczypiące. Nie dość, że puste, to i tak nieprzyjemne w odczuciu. Po chińskim lagerze spodziewałem się mniej niż po europejskich wytworach i się nie zawiodłem, tzn. jest tak słabo, jak się obawiałem. Ale zawsze mogło być gorzej, bo jednak nie poszło w kanał.
Average pils beer, golden color and light taste, light on alcohol as well. Had it both on bottle and can, not much difference.
Nice Chinese lager. Bitter tones, but with a fresh taste that makes it enjoyably drinkable.
From bottle in footed pilsner. Pours pale yellow straw colour with frothy head and a faint fruity/yeasty aroma. Taste, like the aroma, is mild.
bog standard generic fizzy yellow water. drank about quarter of a can and left rest cos I simply couldn’t be bothered to drink it. like water except somehow not as nice...

Dourada clara sem espuma, me lembra muito o sabor das cervas brazucas, tipo Itaipava e Schincariol. Dá pra tomar mas não vale o preço!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Horrible lager. Has an off taste and aftertaste. No head or lacing with some carbonation. Tastes like dried out hay.
Pills très légère passe plutôt pas mal finalement, assez douce et passe bien avec des sushi

Bottled. No glass. Okay. Lots of carbonation. Bitter at the front and doesn't dissipate. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
330 ml bottle from Chinese restaurant. Clear golden with thin white head. Corn, grain and fruit. Semi dry with low bitterness and medium carbonation.

Flaske på en kinesisk restaurant. Farven er lys gul. Smagen er vandet med en smule humlesmag. Lidt sødlig i smagen. En ret kedelig øl. Men hvis man stod i det varme Kina, så ville den sikkert være ganske vidunderlig.

Bottle at a chinese restaurant in Berlin - Like most of the asian beer brewed with rice, Tsingtao has this watery, sweetish, unhoppy taste. Very thin body. Along with a hot meal its quite drinkable though.

Tastes like water with a dubious source. The faint fizziness at the outset of each sip disappears quickly, leaving a limp, liquescent presence that is only with some imagination definable as beer. Easily not finished due to sheer boredom. The 1 point comes from my "do no evil" mantra. It is drinkable, although I can hardly see a reason to do so.
Flaske på dinner. Lys gylden, noe skum. Moderat karbonert . Smaker som en lys lager. Vann og hint av malt. God lager må viate
From a local oriental supermarket comes this not so great lager. Backlog from 2014/06/03.
Shitty foam, funky aroma, pissy consistency but I’m sure it tastes fine in the heat.

Clear pale yellow color with a small white head. Light aroma with some hints of grain. Medium body and an average carbonaton. Ok bitterness. Grainy and herbal flavor.
[Bottle at a chinese restaurant in Askim, Norway]

Pale yellow color with fast disappearing foam. Light smell of wet grains. The taste is crisp and refreshing, but not much more than that. Standard maltiness, standard bitterness, standard carbonation. Short malty aftertaste.
Barwa słomkowa, słaba piana. Zapach pusty, smak też + jakiś dziwny odrzucający aromat.
Bière de soif comme les classiques Carlsberg, Heinkel, Stella ou autre. Couleur très claire, pas de nez, légère au palais.

Schmeckt nach kaum was, aber durchaus süffig. Hinterlässt im Gegensatz zu anderen billigen Lagern keinen schlechten Nachgeschmack, im Gegenteil es ist sogar angenehm.
Völlig in Ordnung, aber einmal trinken reicht.
Bottle 640 ml. Try one Chinese lager - check. Not something I would like to repeat though :)
7.11.2015-Flasche beim Lieblings-Chinesen. Aroma malzig, leicht würzig- etwas bitter im Abgang.Nichts Besonderes, aber klasse zum chicken gong bao.

640ml bomber. Pours a standard pale yellow color. No head, no lacing. Aroma is actually decent, with nice grassy notes. Flavor is slightly malty, with a sourness. Kind of astringent aftertaste. Not as drinkable as I’d hoped.

* Bottle. Pours pale golden, clear, with white head. 
* Aroma is light, bread, grain & floral. 
* Palate is light body, medium carbonation, very fine bubbles. 
* Taste is sweet grain & straw. 
* Finish is moist & refreshing. 
* Overall sweet grain & straw, refreshing.

Cor amarelo palha bem claro, translúcida e com pouco brilho; espuma branca de alta formação e baixa persistência lacing bom para regular.
Aroma gramíneo com um pouco de papelão.
Sabor seguindo o aroma; cerveja bastante linear.
Corpo leve e carbonatação baixa.

0.33l bottle. Clear pale golden body, huge, but quickly collapsing white head. Aroma of bread, sour grains and some floral hops with only a minimal cardboard. Taste of some astringent grains and earthy hops. Flat and thin. The aroma was OK, but everything else was not so pleasant.

A little flat and thin foam proves very briefly at the top of this lager from China. The fragrance is hardly found, but with a little skill you can trace the hops and a subtle aroma of citrus. The taste is first dominated by hops and replaced the side of a little watery taste that results in a bitter taste like something you find in a usual mainstream lager. It certainly has no special features, but is undoubtedly good as a thirst quencher and fits fine for some strong and spicy Chinese dishes.

From the bottle, pours clear golden with quickly vanishing head. Sour nose grainy. Taste is grassy and you can imagin to taste the rice dunno if this is actually the case. Grainy herbal taste. Quick smooth finish. A bit more interesting then other asian Majors...

Bottle, 33cL. Home. A clear pale golden beer with a medium white head ; poor retention. Cereal, herbal (+). Light sweet, light dry bitter refreshing. Light body, thin texture, average carbonation, dry average bitter refreshing finish. Overall, not too bad, OK herbal aroma, refreshing, thin.
Baaardzo nijakie piwo. Aromat, wyglad i smak. Zwykly przecietny lager. Do wypicia na zimno.

Blassgelb mit wenig Schaum. Geschmacklich gar nicht mal so schlecht, wenn auch etwas wässrig. Der Hopfen ist angenehm präsent, womit ich nicht unbedingt gerechnet hätte, dominierend ist jedoch eine leichte malzige Süße .

Extremely average pale lager. Asian beers are all about balance; nothing is ever dominating or extreme. Which, to some people is very bad, we want a specific taste from our beer. For pale lagers, they are supposed to be balanced. As long as they’re not too sweet. This beer flows down easy, tastes good, is refreshing, and is not too sweet.

Kolor: [4/10]
Piana: [5/10]
Zapach: [3/10]
Smak: [5/10]
Nasycenie: [4/10]
Opakowanie: [6/10]
więcej na: http://kapsloland.blogspot.com/2014/12/3-tsingtao.html#more

Cóż można o tym napisać? Aromatu prawie brak, w smaku momentami kwaskowate, ale ogólnie to zupełnie nijakie, goryczki też brak. Nie jest nawet niedobre, po prostu właśnie nijakie. Typowy chiński produkt - niczym się nie wyróżnia i ma być zawsze taki sam.

Bottle 0,33l. Clear, pale gold colored. AROMA- malt, instant citrusy hops. FLAVOR- slightly sour and salty, malt, rice, some unpleasant flavours, moderate bitterness. Light bodied.
Not very good.
Bottle 0,33l from local Lidl. Clear pale body, small white head. Aroma of malts and lemon tea. Taste is empty, sligthly sweet with bad tones. Thin watery body. Bad one.
light malt aroma raster watery slight malt not very strong flavor not really my beer!

Birra semplice. Giallo brillante e trasparente. Al naso odore di malto. In bocca molto carbonata, con un amaro debole tendente al medio, ma abbastanza persistente. Adatta ad accompagnare piatti fritti

This beer whas chugged down efter a long walk on the great wall of China during my honey moon. I did the job of putting out my thirst so thats something. But as a beverage to enjoy for the experience of it I would not recommend.
Bottle. Not offensive, but a soulless and pretty much tasteless lager. Don’t bother with this one.

Ło jejku jejku mamuniu, koloru to prawie niema, jaśniejsze toto niż tymbark jabłkowo-miętowy.
Piany też niema, ale to nawet niema odrobiny bąbelka.

Aromat na szczęście bez skunksa, ale i tak nie powala. Odrobinę owoców z dodatkiem ryżu, jakby trochę mięty. Żelazem też daje.

W smaku jest słodowe, kukurydzy sporo. Pod koniec kwaskowe się robi.

Wysycenie niskie w stronę średniego, wodniste, goryczki praktycznie brak.
Skidt at sige det, men en af de bedre kinesiske øl - men absolut ikke samme standard som øl i Danmark
0,33l fles bij de wok in Arnhem. Hier ga ik weinig woorden aan vuil maken. Zoals veel producten uit China, zielloos en zonder enige smaak.

Bottle into pils glass, clear pale golden color with white head. Aroma notes of pale malt sweetness, grain and faint earth hop. Taste adds faint grass and slight metallic note. Light body, moderate-heavy carbonation, crisp with clean saaz finish. Pretty standard European-style pale lager, no flaws and refreshing.

Pours a clear golden yellow color, topped with an average frothy white head, no retention. Malty aroma, sweet grainy notes. Taste is sweet, lightly watery with minimal final bitterness. A bit metallic aftertaste. Not something I’d drink on a regular basis. But passable when ice col, if nothing else around.
Not the worst tasting lager out there that I’ve had but still not a good lager. Why can’t all lager take a leaf out of brands like Sierra Nevada and use more hops for some flavour?
Pale colour and small froth. Rice and maize flavour with some florar hops. A bit watery with thin body and low carbo.
Tinny, even from the bottle. Not a big fan. Won?t buy again. Much better big brand lagers out there. 5.5/10.

BBD 8/5/15. Clear golden pour. Normal head volume, lacing and slightly below normal retention.

Very light nose, even for a lager, just a hint of yeast and malt.

Light medium body with a smooth texture. Superb carbonation with a bit of effervescence in the middle and just the right amount for a nice prickly finish.

For a lager, the flavor profile is reasonably intense, complexity is lacking but the balance is superb. It begins with a light grainy biscuit that is very subtly sweet. The middle brings an equally subtle mild hop bitterness that is perfectly balanced. Hop flavor is present only as a hint that it’s there. The finish is crisp, clean and leaves you with a fading mild bitterness with a grainy character. No skunking was evidenced. Possibly the best starter beer since it never really assaults the taste buds, but exposes all the classic lager elements in muted fashion.

500 ml can, white with red logo and blue Chinese filigree, labeled 5.0% alc/vol, from Qingdao brewery, and purchased at Liquor Depot. Served in a tall pilsner flute glass. Pours the lightest shade of pale I’ve ever seen in a beer, with plenty of carbonation, and the tiniest wisp of there-and-gone froth. Aroma...almost none. Diluted apple juice and ginger ale most prominently, and smidgens of malt and Rice Krispies without additional sugar. Flavor is identically anemic - it makes Corona seem like a Russian stout. Thinner and more watery than its original brewing water, with the faintest and shortest of aftertastes. If the timid, super-gentle pegasus pony Fluttershy were a beer, she’d be a Tsingtao. My "average" rating is due to it being very pleasantly devoid of anything unpalatable or foul, and for hiding a solid 5% ABV punch behind its mild manner (like Fluttershy’s "Stare" that renders angry, vicious beasts compliant and agreeable). It’s a perfectly fine choice for any food (a spice-extinguisher for fiery cuisine), would make an ideal base for most beer cocktails (quickly, to the lab...for science!), is remarkably refreshing (my farming father used to drink from a pail of water with oats added, claiming it was more hydrating, so I guess the rice in this brew does the same), and is eminently poundable for getting ’faced, if you so wish (I’d highly advise against it; anyone who mistakes this for a 3-4% light/low-carb beer will end up dangerously smashed). I’m not ashamed to admit I like "TT" a lot. It has its charms.

Transfer from BA review on 8-11-13-
 
 Poured from bottle into a pint glass

 Appearance- The beer pours a straw yellow color with a one finger pure white head. The head has a decent level of retention fading over time to leave a light level of lace on the sides of the glass.

 Smell – The smell is of a grassy and lightly sweetened aroma. Along with this is a lighter skunky smell likely due to the non-light defensive green bottle.

 Taste – The taste begins rather sweet and smooth with a caramel, rice, and a bit of sugariness. As the taste advances, a light hint of a grassy hop flavor works its way onto the tongue as well as a little bit of a candied sweet taste. The combination of flavors combined in the end to leave a rather lingering sweet rice flavor on the tongue.

 Mouthfeel –The body of the beer is on the lighter side in thickness and creaminess with a carbonation level that is rather average. Not bad more the rice and sweet flavors of the brew as it makes for a rather easy drinking brew.

 Overall – Ah… easy drinking and moderately refreshing, but nothing really good in this one.
